#!/usr/bin/env python3

# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the number of 500-yen bills required
num_500_yen_bills = N // 500  # 余りが出る

# Calculate the change
change = N % 500  # 余りが出る

# Print the change
print(change)

# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required.
num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000  # This is an integer division.

# Calculate the change
change = N % 1000

# Print the change
print(change)
n = int(input())
print(1000 - n % 1000)
